trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> para o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filhos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.
